sentences.sContent: Service in the armed forces gave many Americans a less xenophobic view of the world.
sentences.sCn: 在武装部队的服役使得许多美国人有了较不排外的世界观。

words.tran: 仇外；对外国人的畏惧和憎恨

trans.tranCn: 恐外的， 恐惧外国人的
trans.tranOther: If you describe someone as xenophobic, you disapprove of them because they show strong dislike or fear of people from other countries
